class.name: VaultHunter.EXE
class.description: Action Skill. Press [LB/L1/F] to run your VaultHunter.EXE program. It will analyze the situation, determine which Vault Hunter would do the best job, and then load an ACTION PACKAGE allowing Claptrap to fight in that manner for a short period of time. It also gives you Full Health and Health Regeneration. VaultHunter.EXE is still in beta and its definition of ''Vault Hunter'' is questionable at best. Warning: VaultHunter.EXE is currently classified as malware. Your allies may be affected.

stats.name: Regenerates 2.5% of your Max Health / sec.

skills.name: All the Guns
skills.description:
Gun Subroutines. You randomly pick a Subroutine focused on a gun type, making you more effective with that gun type, but less effective with all others.
Upon selecting a Subroutine you gain 100 Frag Stacks, which decrease over time. When you run out of Frag Stacks, your Subroutine will be replaced with a new one.

skills.name: Fuzzy Logic
skills.description: Taking damage from an enemy grants you increased Critical Hit Damage for a few seconds.

skills.name: Safety First
skills.description: Defensive Subroutines. You randomly pick a Subroutine focused on either Health or Shields, which grants increased Capacity and Regeneration for the chosen attribute. The catch? You deal reduced damage with all gun types. Upon selecting a Subroutine you gain 100 Frag Stacks, which decrease over time. When you run out of Frag Stacks, your Subroutine will be replaced with a new one.

skills.name: Surprised? Stabilize!
skills.description: Taking damage from an enemy increases your Accuracy and Recoil Reduction with all guns for a few seconds.

skills.name: Rope-a-Derp
skills.description: Melee Subroutine. You randomly pick a melee-focused Subroutine, which grants you a massive melee damage bonus but reduces your damage with guns.

skills.name: Blue Shell
skills.description: Increases Gun Damage, Fire Rate, and Reload Speed while in Fight For Your Life. Also, increases the duration of Fight For Your Life.

skills.name: Tripleclocked
skills.description: Multiplies the Bonuses and Penalties of the current Subroutine by up to three. The fewer Frag Stacks you have, the greater the multiplier. Defensive Subroutines always receive Triple Capacity regardless of stacks. Also, unlocks ACTION PACKAGE One Shot Wonder.

stats.name: One Shot Wonder: Every shot empties all bullets from your clip.

skills.name: Grenade Vent
skills.description: Increases Grenade Damage. Also, throwing a grenade adds Frag Stacks.

skills.name: Element of Surprise
skills.description: Elemental Subroutines. You randomly pick a Subroutine that Increases Damage with a chosen element, but Decreases Damage with all other elements. Upon depleting your shield, filling your shield, or entering Fight For Your Life, you release a Nova of the chosen element.

skills.name: Death Machine
skills.description: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy increases your Gun Damage, Reload Speed, and Movement Speed for a few seconds.

skills.name: Cryogenic Exhaust Manifold
skills.description: Whenever you Slam, you release a Cryo Nova and lose some Frag Stacks.

skills.name: Float like a Bee
skills.description: Increases Melee Damage. Also, killing an enemy with a melee attack grants Frag Stacks, a small amount of Health, and increased Movement Speed for a few seconds.

skills.name: Rainbow Coolant
skills.description: Whenever you initiate a new Subroutine you emit a Rainbow Nova. The Nova consists of all elements, humongous in size, and makes your team super happy. Also, unlocks ACTION PACKAGE Laser Inferno.

stats.name: Laser Inferno: Shoot lasers in all directions at nearby enemies.

skills.name: Best Buds 4 Life
skills.description: Whenever you're revived or you revive someone, you and your buddy gain Health Regeneration and Damage Reduction for a short time. Also, extends Fight For Your Life and increases Weapon Damage while downed.

stats.name: Health Regen: +[$]% of Max Health / sec.

skills.name: Maniacal Laughter
skills.description: Increases Status Effect Chance. Dealing Status Effect Damage to enemies grants stacks of Maniacal Laughter. You and your pals gain Health Regeneration for each stack of Maniacal Laughter. The lower your health, the greater the Health Regeneration. Each stack lasts a few seconds.

stats.name: Regenerates up to [$]% of your Max Health per stack per second.

skills.name: Through Thick And Thin
skills.description: Increases Action Skill Cooldown Rate. While VaultHunter.EXE is running, this bonus is transferred to your allies.

skills.name: Kick Him While He's Down
skills.description: While in Fight For Your Life, you draw aggro from nearby enemies. Also, unlocks ACTION PACKAGE Clap-in-the-Box.

stats.name: "Wanna hear the new dubstep song I wrote?"
Clap-in-the-box: Digistruct a giant bomb that hurts everything around it when it explodes.

skills.name: All The Things Are Awesome!
skills.description: Increases Fire Rate, Weapon Swap Speed, and Max Health. This bonus increases for every teammate in the game. Being part of a team is great!

skills.name: You're... GOING TO LOVE ME!!
skills.description: Killing an enemy creates a Friendship Nova centered on the enemy, Healing you and your friends in the radius. Allies who are low on health are healed for more. Also, unlocks ACTION PACKAGE Gun Wizard.

stats.name: Friendship Nova: Heals up to 15% of your Max Health.
Gun Wizard: You and all allies gain drastically increased fire rate and reload speed.

skills.name: Wax Off, Wax On
skills.description: Improves your Shield Capacity, Shield Recharge Rate, and Shield Recharge Delay.

skills.name: It's a Trap... Card
skills.description: When your Shield becomes depleted, you release a Mega-Nova centered on yourself that heals you and your friends, but hurts enemies. Targets low on health are healed for more. Your Shield must fully recharge between Mega-Novas.

stats.name: Mega-Nova: Heals up to 15% of your Max Health.

skills.name: Pain Simulator is Painful
skills.description: Increases your Max Health and grants a small amount of Damage Reduction.

skills.name: Kick Him While He's Up
skills.description: Whenever you gain Second Wind, your Gun Damage, Melee Damage, and Critical Hit Damage is increased for a few seconds!

skills.name: Organized Guns are Happy Guns
skills.description: Increases Magazine Size with all Weapon Types for you and your buddies.

skills.name: HIGH FIVES GUYS
skills.description: Hold (RS/V) to request a High Five from your friends! A successful High Five increases your and your awesome friend's Gun Damage, Fire Rate, and grants Health Regeneration. Woo! If you don't have any friends, or they leave you hangin', gain increased Gun Damage and Health Regeneration for a few seconds, because screw you guys!

skills.name: Drop the Hammer
skills.description: Reloading your weapon increases your Fire Rate and Reload Speed but makes your Accuracy worse for a few seconds.

skills.name: Killbot
skills.description: Killing an enemy Restores Health, but Costs Shields. If your shields are not currently up then... FREE HEALTH! The lower your health, the greater the amount of health restored.

stats.name: Health Restore: Up to [$]% of Max Health
Shield Cost: Up to [$]% of Max Shields

skills.name: Coincidental Combustion
skills.description: Whenever you shoot an enemy with a non-explosive weapon, you have a chance to deal Bonus Explosive Damage based on your weapon's damage.

skills.name: Repulsive
skills.description: When struck by a melee attack, you emit a powerful Blastwave that pushes that enemy away and deals Explosive Damage.

skills.name: Second Wind (by Tediore)
skills.description: When you enter Fight For Your Life, throw a digistructed copy of yourself which explodes like a grenade, and you continually emit Explosive Novas.

stats.name: "I will not die until you die with me!"

skills.name: Load 'n' Splode
skills.description: Whenever you reload your gun, gain Increased Explosive Damage. This bonus can stack up to five times and each stack only lasts a few seconds.

skills.name: I Am Rubber, You Are Glue
skills.description: Kill Skill. Whenever you kill an enemy, bullets have a chance to reflect off you and towards enemies for a short time. Also, unlocks ACTION PACKAGE Torgue Fiesta.

stats.name: Torgue Fiesta: Whoops! Drop a large amount of grenades that damage enemies and friendlies.

skills.name: Start With a Bang
skills.description: When firing a fully loaded gun after reloading you generate an Explosive Nova centered on you, damaging all nearby enemies. And hurts you... but only a bit.

stats.name: Damage to Self: [$]% of current health

skills.name: Hyperion Punch
skills.description: Melee Override. Dealing Explosive Damage grants you stacks of Hyperion Punch. When you have 5 stacks, press (RS/V) to throw a super awesome punch that deals bonus Incendiary Damage. This consumes all stacks of Hyperion Punch.

skills.name: One Last Thing
skills.description: The last round fired from any weapon's clip gains significant Bonus Damage. Smaller clips reduce the bonus.

skills.name: Livin' Near the Edge
skills.description: Increases Fire Rate and Reload Speed. The lower your health and shields, the greater the bonus. Also, unlocks ACTION PACKAGE Pirate Ship Mode.

stats.name: Pirate Ship Mode: Turn into an AWESOME PIRATE SHIP! With CANNONS!
